name: Patient Navigation
description: The Women’s Cancer Resource Center assists low-income woman with a cancer diagnosis by providing the following support services: - a trusting and respectful relationship - accompaniment to medical and treatment appointments - case management of cancer care - collaboration with social workers - transportation along with navigation - home visits as needed - help with processing and adjusting to life-changing experiences - support throughout cancer journey (including survivorship)
fullDescription: The Women’s Cancer Resource Center assists low-income woman with a cancer diagnosis by providing the following support services: - a trusting and respectful relationship - accompaniment to medical and treatment appointments - case management of cancer care - collaboration with social workers - transportation along with navigation - home visits as needed - help with processing and adjusting to life-changing experiences - support throughout cancer journey (including survivorship)
whatTheyOffer: The Women’s Cancer Resource Center assists low-income woman with a cancer diagnosis by providing the following support services: - a trusting and respectful relationship - accompaniment to medical and treatment appointments - case management of cancer care - collaboration with social workers - transportation along with navigation - home visits as needed - help with processing and adjusting to life-changing experiences - support throughout cancer journey (including survivorship)
howToGetIt: For more information call the mainline.
